meanings.sent1: The balloon was unribbed, making it easy to twist into different shapes.
meanings.sent2: The smooth fabric of the shirt felt unribbed against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The unribbed pillow looked like a fluffy cloud on the bed.
meanings.sent4: Her unribbed hair flowed down her back like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The unribbed surface of the lake reflected the clear blue sky above.

meanings.sent1: The unribbed glass was sleek and modern in design.
meanings.sent2: The unribbed tires provided a smooth ride on the road.
meanings.sent3: The unribbed ice cream cone was a refreshing treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: Her unribbed gloves kept her hands warm in the cold winter air.
meanings.sent5: The unribbed metal surface gleamed in the sunlight, looking like a mirror.
